description: Look for the encrypted cpassword value within Group Policy Preference files on the Domain Controller. This value can be decrypted with gpp-decrypt.
author: frack113
name: Findstr GPP Passwords
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\findstr.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"FINDSTR.EXE")) AND (process.command_line.text:"*cpassword*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\\sysvol\\*" AND process.command_line.text:"*.xml*"))
